item.title: Sat, 6 Dec 2025 22:02:14 UTC
item.description:
In the past few days I renamed all the Python packages using the “python-” prefix.
Given the amount of work, and the fact that some packages were mixed together,
I may have made mistakes, especially since I tried to automate everything with scripts.
If you notice any errors, please let me know. Thanks.

 Renamed to python-asn1crypto.

item.title: Thu, 4 Dec 2025 19:09:53 UTC
item.description:
Compiled the Python modules in Kismet, as some plugins require them.
However, Python support in Kismet has been deprecated,
so there may still be issues despite patching kismetexternal.
Please report any problems.
